s.text: I'd almost forgotten that legendary chapter in Graham and Dodd's Security Analysis : 'On the Importance of Fame in Valuing Stocks.
I'd almost forgotten that legendary chapter in Graham and Dodd's Security Analysis : 'On the Importance of Fame in Valuing Stocks.
I'd almost forgotten that legendary chapter in Graham and Dodd's Security Analysis : 'On the Importance of Fame in Valuing Stocks.
It was actually an impressive feat of discriminating between good and bad stocks on the part of the market, instead of the perhaps more common "Kill 'em all and let God sort 'em out" approach.
